name: Quien
description:
I challenged myself to practice for game jams!

Game Description:

The bus kicks you off, it is the last stop.

The air is thick with the scent of death, and you can feel the malevolent energy coursing through the air.

You know that you must leave this place quickly, before it's too late.

The town's dark past weighs heavily on your mind, and the longer you spend in this vile reality, the more you realize the cult's influence has never truly faded away.

There is an unearthly presence waiting to claim his next victim.

Will you be able to escape the curse that plagues this cursed town, or will you become its next sacrifice?
